",["$r","p",null,{"children":["选择你的 Debian/Ubuntu 版本，文本框中内容写进 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/rudder.list"}]]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/rudder.list","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["Debian 12",{"release_name":"bookworm"}],["Debian 11",{"release_name":"bullseye"}],["Ubuntu 20.04 LTS",{"release_name":"focal"}],["Ubuntu 18.04 LTS",{"release_name":"bionic"}],["Ubuntu 16.04 LTS",{"release_name":"xenial"}],["Ubuntu 14.04 LTS",{"release_name":"trusty"}]]},{"title":"Rudder 版本号","items":[["6.0",{"version":"6.0"}],["5.0",{"version":"5.0"}],["4.3",{"version":"4.3"}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/apt/{{version}} {{release_name}} main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"rhelcentos-用户","children":"RHEL/CentOS 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/rudder.repo"}],"，内容为："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/rudder.repo","menus":[{"title":"Rudder 版本号","items":[["6.0",{"version":"6.0"}],["5.0",{"version":"5.0"}],["4.3",{"version":"4.3"}]]}],"code":"[Rudder_{{version}}]
name=Rudder {{version}}
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/rpm/rudder{{version}}-RHEL_$releasever/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://repository.rudder.io/rpm/rudder_rpm_key.pub","codeLanguage":"ini"}]]}]
